properties.Title: Title/Display Text
properties.navigationBar.title: Title
properties.Title._toolTip:
Page Name 
Specify a unique name to control page transition correctly.
properties.srcLocation._toolTip:
Where do you want to store this page definition file? 
Select 'Bundle' to add page definition to the App binary for device. 
Select 'Remote file' to add it to App Server which can be updated any time
properties.backgroundColor._toolTip: Click colour picker to select background color for page
properties.backgroundImage._toolTip: The image uploaded will be displayed as the background image on page, if 'WireFrame Image Visible' is checked
properties.bgImageVisible._toolTip: If Selected, the uploaded 'WireFrame Image' will be displayed as background image on page
properties.navigationBar.barStyle._toolTip: Change the navigation bar & tab bar style.
properties.navigationBar.title._toolTip: Enter the title. If no title is entered, the default title will be used.
properties.navigationBar.prompt._toolTip: Enter prompt to display prompt text above the title. It is not set by default. If Specified, the navigation bar will adjust to display both prompt text and title.
properties.navigationBar.tintColor._toolTip: Use the colour picker to change the tint colour of the navigation bar
properties.toolBarTop.hidden._toolTip: If checked, the top Toolbar should be hidden
properties.toolBarTop.backgroundColor._toolTip: Background Color of top Tool bar
properties.toolBarTop.Children._toolTip: Add UI elements in top Tool bar
properties.toolBarBottom.hidden._toolTip: If checked, the bottom Toolbar should be hidden
properties.toolBarBottom.backgroundColor._toolTip: Background Color of bottom Tool bar
properties.toolBarBottom.Children._toolTip: Add UI elements in bottom Tool bar
properties.TabBase.tintColor._toolTip: Use the colour picker to change the tint colour of the tab bar
properties.TabBase.icontitle._toolTip: Enter text for tab icon. (It may not display correctly if the string length is long)
properties.TabBase.icon.fileDic._toolTip: Select the tab icon file to upload or select one of the default icons

properties.Children[0].frame.width._toolTip: The width specified will be the width of the frame in the page
properties.Children[0].frame.height._toolTip: The Height specified will be the height of the frame in the page
properties.Children[0].frame.x._toolTip: Set the X coordinates for the free scroll page frame
properties.Children[0].frame.y._toolTip: Set the Y coordinates for the free scroll page frame
properties.Children[0].backgroundColor._toolTip: Click colour picker to select background color for page
properties.backgroundImage._toolTip: The image uploaded will be displayed as the background image on page, if 'WireFrame Image Visible' is checked
properties.bgImageVisible._toolTip: If Selected, the uploaded 'WireFrame Image' will be displayed as background image on page
properties.zoomEnabled._toolTip: At RT side, page zoom should be enabled or not.

properties.Children[0].Group[*].Footer._toolTip: Text entered is shown as group footer
properties.Children[0].Group[*].rowarray[*].backgro: Set the background color of this cell by using the color picker.
